original_text: And in his teaching he said, “Beware of the scribes, who like to walk around in long robes and like greetings in the marketplaces
korean_text: 예수께서 가르치실 때에 이르시되 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것과 시장에서 문안 받는 것과

sentences.original_text: And in his teaching he said,
who like to walk around in long robes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 긴 옷을 입고 다니는 것을 좋아하며,

sentences.original_text: and like greetings in the marketplaces
sentences.korean_translation: 시장에서 문안 인사를 받는 것을 좋아한다.
